article_title: Nurse Jobs Shift From The Hospital To The Community

article_metadata.description: An increasing number of nurses are getting their first jobs outside of the hospital as the healthcare system moves from fee-for-service medicine to population health that focuses on outreach and tries to keep patients well. About 76% of new nurses got jobs in U.S. hospitals in 2012 compared to 87% in 2005, [...]
article_metadata.author: Bruce Japsen
